welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aviano, a charming Italian city known for its rich history, stunning scenery, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the beauty and charm this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Airfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights at Airfield Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password from the information desk.
